primary.context: Caller wants to pay maintenance fees but refuses the digital link option.
primary.detail: The caller requested to pay over the phone rather than via link, so the agent transferred them to the concierge department.

steps: Caller stated they wanted to make a maintenance payment.
Agent offered to send a payment link via text or email.
Caller declined the link and insisted on paying over the phone.
Agent initiated a transfer to the concierge department.
Caller remained in the queue for over 20 minutes before the transcript ends with background noise/audio bleed.

actions.detail: Transferred to concierge per customer request for phone payment.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a maintenance payment but specifically requested to do it over the phone. The agent correctly identified this as a need for a human agent and transferred the call to the concierge queue.
insights.verbatim: No. On the phone. I'm gonna call and make it over the phone payment.
